reviewText: Actually it is wide screen but you have to have a full screen t.v. to see it that way.  On a wide screen t.v. it comes up on the whole screen.

It seems this DVD not in widescreen? Come on Fox, get with the times. A lot of us now have widescreen TV's and hate to watch the game in a box. You would think since Fox broadcasted this game in HD widescreen, they could produce a DVD in widescreen. I will not be buying this unless they change the format.
